titleStmt.title: The impostures of seducing teachers discovered; in a sermon before the Right Honorable the Lord Major and court of Aldermen of the city of London, at their anniversary meeting on Tuesday in Easter weeke, April 23, 1644. at Christ-Church. By Richard Vines, minister of Gods word at Weddington in the county of Warwick, and a member of the Assembly of Divines. Imprimatur, Charles Herle.
titleStmt.author: Vines, Richard, 1600?-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M. for Abel Roper at the signe of the Sunne over against St Dunstans church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Sunne over against St Dunstans church in Fleet-street
